snippet: Some Washington State legislators are proposing a 20 percent tuition surcharge for international students at public universities and community colleges as a way to raise revenues.
abstract: Some Washington State lawmakers, as way to raise revenues, propose 20 percent tuition surcharge for international students at state's public universities and community colleges; critics say surcharge could force such students to go elsewhere.
lead_paragraph: Some Washington State legislators are proposing a 20 percent tuition surcharge for international students at public universities and community colleges as a way to raise revenues.

headline.seo: Washington State Eyes Foreign Student Surcharge
headline.main: Washington Eyes Raising State Tuition of Foreigners
headline.print_headline: Washington Eyes Raising State Tuition Of Foreigners
